data.persona: I am a customer in the village market . I have traveled to town to buy salt and meat . I travel with my sons and wife.
data.description:
You are in the Saokra's Blacksmith Shop.
Saokra's Blacksmith Shop is lined with weapons. They are shown through the outside windows, and once you step inside you see everything from bo staffs to canons. Most of the shop is cool for the work that goes on inside. There are dozens of painted maps on the walls and ceiling. There's a bookshelf over to the left side of the shop that holds nothing but rolled up scrolls, and some have fallen to the floor. Armor sets adorn the manikins to the back of the room. There's a vibrant royal blue knight set of armor that causes the back area to light up in a cool glow of blue. The middle of the room has sunlight beaming into it via a skylight that gives the area a warm feeling.
The knight is here.

You are carrying a bag.

            "extra_desc": "Saokra's Shop has been around for years, Saokra herself has always been the owner of it. No one's sure how but it's believed that she was once a God, and possibly still is but instead of living her life in the heavens she chose to live with the people and enjoys her work. One of the reasons for this is that the shop in question seemed to be around for more than a hundred years and with each weapon or armor set she creates you can feel a hum within it. No one's sure why she decided to live the life she does but everyone is grateful to her for having helped keep some of the bad souls away.",

data.short_motivation: I want to buy food for dinner.
data.mid_motivation: I want to make a nice homemade stew at home tonight.
data.long_motivation: I want to show my extended family a nice big meal next month for christmas.
